section.name: Developer's How-to: OpenUI Document Field Tree List Picker

subsection.name: Configuring OpenUI Field Extension
subsection.p: You should add a custom OpenUI Field Extension configuration like the following example in YAML format. This is an example called exampleCategoryPicker with ../../examples/hippoblogarticles.jsp (e.g, http://localhost:8080/cms/examples/msc.jsp) page which responds with a list of tree items or single item in JSON:

tr.td: The display name of this OpenUI Extension. See Configure a Document Field Extension for detail.
The type of extension point. This should be set to document.field. See Configure a Document Field Extension for detail.
The OpenUI Extension page URL, provided by this plugin. This should be set to angular/exdocpickerbase-openui/index.html. See Configure a Document Field Extension for detail.
The initial height of this plugin in the document editor in pixels. See Configure a Document Field Extension for detail.

The JSON string of the configuration for this plugin. See below.
{ "findOneUrl": "../../examples/msc.jsp?id={{id}}", "findAllUrl": "../../examples/msc.jsp", "treeViewMode": true }
